short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocker Ads - blocks all annoying ads, malware and tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocker Ads is our new extension with which you can block any ads on completely different sites.  All you need to do is install Blocker Ads.  This product is absolutely safe for you.  You don't have to worry about someone finding out about your personal information.  Everything is very confidential in Blocker Ads.  Once you install our extension, you will not suffer from many advertisements.  We will not use the resources of your device, because our product works without them.  It is also completely free for everyone.  Download now Blocker Ads and start using.
